body.p:
Monroe Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
vs
Bud Cloyd &
John Short

The Commonwealth of Kentucky ^grand Jury of Monroe County^ in the Name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse John Short & Bud Cloyd of the crime of horse Stealing committed as follows viz the said Short & Cloyd on the day of January 1865 in the Name County aforesaid did feloniously take steal and carry away one horse the property of Thomas Baiter
Against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

J H C Sandridge Aty
for Commonwealth
Copy of Indictment
